title: Pangle Adapter Params
description: A schema which validates params accepted by the Pangle adapter

reward.description: An integer defining the reward (skip) from Pangle

region.description: A string defining region for choosing the closest Pangle endpoint

skadn_supported.description: A bool config to determine if SKADN is supported by Pangle

mraid_supported.description: A bool config to determine if MRAID is supported by Pangle
